title: MD
biography: K. K. Mahajan was an Indian cinematographer who was known for his work in Parallel Cinema. In a career that spanned over four decades, he won four National Film Awards. He was best known for his work with filmmakers such as Kumar Shahani, Mani Kaul, Basu Chatterjee and Mrinal Sen.
aiSummary: A. K. Mahajan is a lung cancer trials specialist with an H-index of 110 at Oncology (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet Oncology, Aging Cell, Frontiers in Neuroscience. Based in India.
